question: Who won National Award on acting cinematography?
explanation: The field of cinematography is one woman who has become the leading lady to win a national award of cinematography for her first film. Anjuli Shukla became the first lady to win the award for Malayalam film industry. It has come up like a challenge for her to shoot a film which she is quite unknown and oblivion of. Acing her skills in this profession the female has proved herself in a male-dominated industry.
